name: nev_attack_11
text: Ozh icha gluth izh sol. (I will eat your soul.)
text_simple: ozh icha gluth izh sol i will eat your soul

name: nev_battlebegins_01
text: It's the perfect time to start a new collection!
text_simple: its the perfect time to start a new collection

name: nev_blink_02
text: The eyes of the soul never blink.
text_simple: the eyes of the soul never blink

name: nev_deny_02
text: Hahaha! I'll never give you the satisfaction.
text_simple: hahaha ill never give you the satisfaction

name: nev_deny_07
text: I'll never give you the satisfaction.
text_simple: ill never give you the satisfaction

name: nev_firstblood_01
text: First soul swimming in First Blood sauce!
text_simple: first soul swimming in first blood sauce

name: nev_firstblood_02
text_simple: first blood sauce for the soul

name: nev_firstblood_03
text: First Soul is more my sort of thing.
text_simple: first soul is more my sort of thing

name: nev_haste_02
text: Such haste is unseemly...but I'll take it.
text_simple: such haste is unseemly but ill take it

name: nev_illus_02
text: You'll never know which is which.
text_simple: youll never know which is which

name: nev_immort_03
text: Ha ha ha ha ha! Immortality!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha immortality

name: nev_immort_04
text: Ha ha ha ha ha! To die...Nevermore!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha to die nevermore

name: nev_kill_01
text: I'll take that soul if you're not using it.
text_simple: ill take that soul if youre not using it

name: nev_kill_06
text: Another soul? Don't mind if I do.
text_simple: another soul dont mind if i do

name: nev_kill_08
text: I'll see you in the Abysm.
text_simple: ill see you in the abysm

name: nev_kill_11
text: A beautiful soul for my collection.
text_simple: a beautiful soul for my collection

name: nev_level_07
text: I have more room in my collection.
text_simple: i have more room in my collection

name: nev_lose_04
text: Never has there been such a day!
text_simple: never has there been such a day

name: nev_lose_06
text: All this has been for nothing?
text_simple: all this has been for nothing

name: nev_purch_01
text: I've been saving up for this.
text_simple: ive been saving up for this

name: nev_purch_02
text: I thought this hour would never come.
text_simple: i thought this hour would never come

name: nev_purch_04
text: Been saving all those pennies off the dead men's eyes...
text_simple: been saving all those pennies off the dead mens eyes

name: nev_rare_02
text: It's true, I have the soul of a poet. I just can't remember where I put it.
text_simple: its true i have the soul of a poet i just cant remember where i put it

name: nev_rare_05
text: So, you're curious where I come from? There's one easy way to find out for yourself.
text_simple: so youre curious where i come from theres one easy way to find out for yourself

name: nev_rival_01
text: Your tormented soul will shine in my collection.
text_simple: your tormented soul will shine in my collection

name: nev_rival_02
text: I had marked your soul for collection when you were but a wisp of evil.
text_simple: i had marked your soul for collection when you were but a wisp of evil

name: nev_rival_03
text: Ozh vo'wroth thok omoz, Lucifash. (I will never return to your pit, Lucifer.)
text_simple: ozh vowroth thok omoz lucifash i will never return to your pit lucifer

name: nev_rival_04
text: I'll keep your soul where light cannot defile it.
text_simple: ill keep your soul where light cannot defile it

name: nev_rival_05
text: Your shadow soul's within my grasp.
text_simple: your shadow souls within my grasp

name: nev_rival_06
text: Demon, your shadow is cheerily bright, compared to my uttermost absence of light.
text_simple: demon your shadow is cheerily bright compared to my uttermost absence of light

name: nev_rival_07
text: Sav omoz acha Ozh! (Seventh hell is mine!)
text_simple: sav omoz acha ozh seventh hell is mine

name: nev_rival_08
text: Ozh ahm'poz arkosh. (I am more powerful than the master!)
text_simple: ozh ahmpoz arkosh i am more powerful than the master

name: nev_rival_09
text: Vo'hadoq greesh. Sol icha Ozh! (Keep your debt. The souls are mine!)
text_simple: vohadoq greesh sol icha ozh keep your debt the souls are mine

name: nev_rival_10
text: Ozh acha vo'izh. (I am yours no longer!)
text_simple: ozh acha voizh i am yours no longer

name: nev_rival_11
text: Ha ha ha ha ha. A Soul Keeper for my Keep of Souls.
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha a soul keeper for my keep of souls

name: nev_rival_12
text: Soul Keeper? Say rather, Soul Keepsake!
text_simple: soul keeper say rather soul keepsake

name: nev_rival_13
text: I guess gingers do have souls. Mm, delicious.
text_simple: i guess gingers do have souls mm delicious

name: nev_spawn_04
text: I sense the proximity of souls...
text_simple: i sense the proximity of souls

name: nev_thanks_01
text: I thank you from the bottom of my souls.
text_simple: i thank you from the bottom of my souls

name: nev_win_03
text: There has never been such a victory!
text_simple: there has never been such a victory

name: nev_win_04
text: A victory never to be forgotten!
text_simple: a victory never to be forgotten
